articles.description: Mojang Studios has confirmed the release date for Minecraft's The Wild update, which arrives in June and adds new biomes, mobs, and blocks.
articles.content:
The Wild Update arrives on June 7th, bringing the Deep Dark and Mangrove Swamp biomes, along with the Warden, Allay, and Frog mobs.When does The Wild update arrive for Minecraft?
